Learn More

Simple, affordable web hosting.

Our mission is to empower individuals and small business owners to reach the world with affordable yet performant and secure web hosting.

Our servers are typically provisioned with settings geared toward Wordpress hosting but any platform can be accomodated! Browse below to see the package that suits your needs and if you need more information, contact us .

Our Features

Rainy Day Protection

There'll be no rainy days being hosted with Minma. With very high uptime, monitoring, and frequent backups of your site you won't have to worry about your site's performance and stability.

Connect with the world

Your online presence will allow you to connect with your customers like never before.

Security features included

Each one of our packages comes with an SSL certificate, modern HTTP headers, and more security features. With our Advanced package, we offer a custom security consultation based on your site.

Blazing fast

With smart server architecture, multiple types of caching, and by leveraging services like AWS, we give your the fastest possible load times.
